question: 段階
sourceMnemonic: The current <kanji>step</kanji> of the <kanji>floor</kanji> is at the second <vocabulary>stage</vocabulary>. Now it's at the third <vocabulary>stage</vocabulary>. Now it's in the final <vocabulary>phase</vocabulary>! Nice!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
